title: Property Transfer Tax (Exemption) (No. 2) Order, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 119
Gazette dated Friday, 19th June, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 35 OF 2015
The Property Transfer Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap. 340)
The Property Transfer Tax (Exemption) (No. 2)
Order, 2015
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section six of the Property
Transfer Tax Act, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Property Transfer Tax Title
(Exemption) (No. 2) Order, 2015.
2. The following shall be exempted from property transfer tax: exemption
from tax
(a) the transfer of shares from Reserved Minerals Corporation
(In Liquidation) to Kariba Minerals Limited; and
(b) the transfer of shares from Kariba Minerals Limited to
ZCCM Investments Holdings Plc.
A. B. CHIKWANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
10th June, 2015
[MF/IDM.15/3/2]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K2.00 each
120 Statutory Instruments 19th June, 2015
